Project Overview

As part of a development team, this company's website was redesigned and developed more fully to provide additional information for Premium Tattoo and their designs.

The challenege was to design and execute a minimalistic and user friendly website incorporating the owner's color and font requests.

Interactions were kept simple and straight forward as the owner didn't want anything flashy. To ensure that the website would be engaging, each section had its own background image and banner, and hover effects were given for each link.

Role Art Director | UX/UI

Tools Photoshop | Illustrator

When September 2015

View Project

Note: This links to the website I worked on.

Premium Tattoo has changed their website; I host this version for you to view.
